3: The storyline always has twists and turns. No one ever wants a dull life. Our protagonist will always go through a perilous journey with wits and agility. The evil villains are like faithful followers. Each of them carries important responsibilities that no one else can bear for them.

The deadly vipers always reveal themselves at the exact right moment, just like how pigeons timely come out of a magician's hat. Calamity always bides its time, and it will agonize its prey until fear grips the audience's hearts, tears roll down their cheeks, and rounds of applause burst out.
Upon realizing this ridiculous thought in your head, you let out a wry smile, put down the raft that you are making, and look in the direction where the sound is coming from.
—This is the destiny of a champion.
You notice the subtle difference in the sound. The dragon roar is there before you hear the pipe.
But shortly afterward, the pipe becomes 'guidance.'
